events.title: Builder Vancouver Launch Event
events.description: Join us for the inaugural Builder Vancouver event! We'll introduce the Builder movement, explore Vancouver's Bitcoin ecosystem, and kick off our monthly meetup series. This is the perfect opportunity to meet fellow builders, learn about our community, and get involved.

schedule.title: Networking & Pizza
schedule.description: Welcome! Grab some pizza, meet fellow builders, and get settled in.

schedule.title: Introduction & Overview
schedule.description: Introduction to Builder Vancouver and overview of the evening.

schedule.title: Spiral.xyz and the Bitcoin Merchant Community Website
schedule.description: Mat Balez presents a comprehensive overview of Spiral.xyz and the Bitcoin Merchant Community Website.

schedule.title: Nostr and Building Community in Vancouver
schedule.description: Martin Montero from Rabble Labs presents on Nostr and the community being built in Vancouver.

schedule.title: The Bepsi Machine: Building a Bitcoin Vending Machine
schedule.description: Eric Chennels discusses the tools and techniques used to build the Bepsi machine—a Bitcoin vending machine—and how vibe coding accelerated the development process.

schedule.title: Introducing Bitpoints.me – A Bitcoin-native rewards system
schedule.description: JP shares the story of Bitpoints.me, a Bitcoin-native rewards system that transforms traditional loyalty points into sats.

schedule.title: Vibe Coding the Builder Resource Center
schedule.description: How the Builder Ops Team uses structured content, ChatGPT, and Cursor Agents to ship Bitcoin education faster.

schedule.title: News Topics Discussion
schedule.description: Discussion of current Bitcoin news topics and developments.

schedule.title: Open Floor: Topic Suggestions
schedule.description: Open floor for suggestions and ideas for future discussion topics.

sections.title: What to Expect
sections.body: This inaugural event will introduce you to Builder Vancouver and our community. We'll cover what Builder is, why Vancouver is a great Bitcoin builder city, and what to expect at future meetups. There will be plenty of time for questions, discussion, and networking.

sections.title: Who Should Attend
sections.body: Everyone is welcome! Whether you're a seasoned Bitcoin developer, a designer interested in Bitcoin UX, a curious newcomer, or someone building Bitcoin products - there's a place for you in our community.

sections.title: Getting There
sections.body: Join us at Funk Cafe in Vancouver. Follow us on social media for updates.

meta.title: Builder Vancouver Launch Event | Builder Vancouver
meta.description: Join us for the inaugural Builder Vancouver event! Introduction to Builder, Vancouver's Bitcoin ecosystem, and kick off our monthly meetup series.
